messages:
Name: Rony Lopes
Nationality: Portugal
Date of Birth: December 28, 1995
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Troyes
Ligue 1 clubs played for: Lille, Monaco, Nice, Troyes

Midfielder Rony Lopes plays for Troyes and has played in the vast majority of the team's Ligue 1 games in 2022/2023, making 32 appearances overall and playing 2,359 minutes. He has been selected in the starting XI in 29 of these appearances across their 38 fixtures and been used as a substitute on three occasions.

Lopes last featured in the league on June 3 for Troyes versus Lille. In that match he scored a goal for his side in their 1-1 draw. The midfielder has scored seven Ligue 1 goals this campaign. He has been booked twice.
It was versus Lorient that Lopes scored for the first time in the league this season in a 2-2 draw on October 23.
Lopes played 18 Super League 1 games last season for Olympiakos Piraeus, scored three goals and provided two assists.
Lopes moved to Troyes in August 2022 from Sevilla, for whom he made five league appearances in total.

Lopes made his Ligue 1 debut for Monaco on September 20, 2015, playing 37 minutes as a starter against Lorient at the age of 19 years and 266 days. He debuted at Ligue 1 level for current outfit Troyes during their game with Angers SCO on August 28, 2022.
In his Ligue 1 career overall, he has appeared in 185 matches in the competition, with 36 goals and 21 assists. Lopes has also been sent off once, with 13 yellow cards collected overall.
